alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 05 at 4:46AM MST until January 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West and northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. Periods of snow and blowing snow could also lower visibility and make roads slick. * WHERE...Sweetwater County. This includes I-80 across portions of southern Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 8 PM evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous, as the combination of wind and snow could greatly reduce visibility and increase the blowover risk or slide offs.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle. Keep two hands on your steering wheel in case of a sudden, strong wind gust.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
